name: Ritika
greetingText: Waise toh yeh aise hi banaya tha thoda late hain I know but phir bhi
wishText: Jaise yeh birthday tha waise tera har birthday khushiyon se bhara reh
text2: Dekh bhejne ke liye subah bhejakyuki thoda boring lag rha tha but mein late wish kr rha tha
text3: Abhi thoda free hua hi hu toh lele thoda coder ke taraf se wish
text4: Maanta hu late hu mein but apne
text4Adjective: PAGAL Friend ke liye itna toh kr hi skta hu 😝
text5Content: You are Special and a bit slow
wishHeading: Happy Birthday meri smart and beautiful PAGAL!
outroText: Abhi yeh pasand aya toh Msg kr dena
replayText: Ha aur wapas dekhna hain toh ispe click krdena
